description:
Snow quietly falls over Kabukicho. The Shinsengumi receives word of anti-foreign faction members gathering at Ikezuya Inn to discuss a supposed takeover of the Terminal. As they prepare to take down the faction, Kondo entrusts his safety to Hijikata—with a booger dangling from his nose. The booger swings with every breath, and the nose is making whistling noises. Worried how it may affect the team’s morale, Hijikata makes every attempt to handle the situation before anybody notices!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Leviathantte Kiitara Doushite mo Sazae-san ga Chiratsuku Ore no Baka!!
Whenever I hear Leviathan, I think of Sazae-san. Stupid Me!!
リヴァイアサンってきいたらどうしてもサザエさんがチラつく俺のバカ!!
